document_data.name: ''Nasher's Nimble Boots''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Nasher's nimble boots''''' was a pair of [[enchanted]] [[boot]]s that once belonged to Lord [[Nasher Alagondar]] of [[Neverwinter]].
document_data.Powers: These boots significantly improved the wearer's dexterity through magical enchantments.
document_data.History:
Even though many doubted their authenticity, ''Nasher's nimble boots'' had a capital letter "N" carved into the heel. The letter indicated the boots' owner as none other than Lord Nasher. It was believed that Lord Nasher lost this pair at some point before the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, but the story remained unknown to anyone but the ruler's closest friends. Many believed that there existed a total of five items, including these boots, that belonged to Lord Nasher, and if worn together, they could grant great powers to their owner. However, that was never proven to be true.

In 1372 DR, ''Nasher's nimble boots'' found their way to a ruined [[Highcliff Castle]], which was taken over by the [[King of Shadows]]'s shadowpriests.
